Name: Nixxsz Castle
About the game: Nixxsz Castle is a classic 2D platformer game and also a game designer portfolio... This is not a complete game and the levels are made to show some designer skills and ideas. Explore 3 levels, find secrets, solve movement puzzles, overcome platform challenges and find lots of keys...
